member.name: T:ConControls.ConsoleContext
member.summary: The context for a console UI session.
member.remarks: This context takes control over the console input buffer and the current screen buffer to provide UI functionality. Only one context may be instantiated at a time. Make sure to dispose of any previously instantiated contexts before creating a new one.

member.name: P:ConControls.ConsoleContext.IsDisposed
member.summary: This instance has already been disposed.

member.name: M:ConControls.ConsoleContext.#ctor
member.summary: Opens a new . Only one instance can exist at a time. Be sure to dispose of any previously instantiated contexts.
member.exception: A previously instantiated has not yet been disposed of. Only a single context can exist at a time.

member.name: M:ConControls.ConsoleContext.Finalize
member.summary: Cleans up native resources.

member.summary: Interface to a .

member.name: E:ConControls.IConsoleContext.SizeChanged
member.summary: Raised when the console window size changed.

member.name: E:ConControls.IConsoleContext.BackgroundColorChanged
member.summary: Raised when the background color of the console window changed.

member.name: E:ConControls.IConsoleContext.Disposed
member.summary: Raised when this console context is disposed of.

member.name: P:ConControls.IConsoleContext.Size
member.summary: Gets or sets the size of the console window. The is the number of characters per row. The is the number of lines.

member.name: P:ConControls.IConsoleContext.Width
member.summary: Gets or sets the width of the console window (in character columns).

member.name: P:ConControls.IConsoleContext.Height
member.summary: Gets or sets the size of the console window (the number of rows).

member.name: P:ConControls.IConsoleContext.BackgroundColor
member.summary: Gets or sets the background color of the console window.

member.name: P:ConControls.IConsoleContext.Title
member.summary: The title of the console window.

member.name: P:ConControls.IConsoleContext.SynchronizationLock
member.summary: An object that can be used to synchronize threads that want to execute conosle operations

member.name: M:ConControls.IConsoleContext.Refresh
member.summary: Refreshes the console window. This updates window (and buffer) sizes and colors and redraws the embedded console controls.

member.summary: Sucht eine lokalisierte Zeichenfolge, die There can only be one single console context at a time! Dispose of any existing console context before instantiating a new one. ähnelt.
